sentences.en: a report by experts convened by the National Institutes of Health
sentences.cn: 由全国健康协会召集的专家提出的一份报告

sentences.en: Congress will convene again in the fall.
sentences.cn: 国会将于秋季再度举行会议.

sentences.en: Convene and Preside over the Arbitration Jury.
sentences.cn: 召集及主持仲裁委员会.

sentences.en: Convene more joint - institute meetings concerning important issues and enhance communication with our sector.
sentences.cn: 就重要议题召开更多的四会联合会议,加强业界的沟通.

sentences.en: Convene opportunity of screening committee ( decision to pursue idea or not )
sentences.cn: 召集审查委员会 ( 决定是否贯彻思想 )

sentences.en: Every Monday morning I convene and preside over our department meeting.
sentences.cn: 每个星期一的早上,我召集和主持部门会议.

sentences.en: I was very glad to convene them all together one afternoon at Chequers.
sentences.cn: 一天下午,我很高兴地把他们召集到契克斯.

sentences.en: In the golden-autumn October, the annual net abundant will convene in the Beijing Exhibition Center.
sentences.cn: 金秋十月, 一年一度的网博会又将在北京展览馆召开.

sentences.en: Perhaps it is necessary to convene this sort of conference once a year.
sentences.cn: 这样的会,恐怕是有必要一年开一次.

sentences.en: The chairman may convene interim board meetings on motion of one - third or more of the directors.
sentences.cn: 经 三分之一 以上董事提议,可由董事长召开董事会临时会议.

sentences.en: The Diet will convene at 3 p.m. tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 国会将于明天下午三点钟开会.

sentences.en: The House and the Senate will convene at noon to hear an address by the President.
sentences.cn: 众议院与参议院将在中午集合听总统发表演说.

sentences.en: The next meeting will convene on coming sunday at the same place.
sentences.cn: 下次会议将于本星期日在同一地点举行.

sentences.en: The promoters shall convene a founding meeting within thirty days.
sentences.cn: 发起人应当在三十日内主持召开公司创立大会.

sentences.en: When do you expect the conference will convene?
sentences.cn: 你预计会议什么时候召开?

trans.tran_en: if a group of people convene, or someone convenes them, they come together, especially for a formal meeting
if a group of people convene, or someone convenes them, they come together, especially for a formal meeting
